bio:treatment.description: Plants 3–20 cm. Basal leaf blades 0.5–3[–3.5] × 0.9–3.5[–5] cm. Flowers: sepals usually without purple stripe; lowest petal 6–10 mm. Seeds 1.5–2 mm. 2n = 12.
